function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate building stock that cannot be economically replaced or upgraded due to cultural reasons","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to poor building infrastructure","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation and air filtration systems, and promoting behavioral changes to reduce transmission","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation and air filtration systems","People":"Residents, employees, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, building owners, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Behavior patterns of individuals unwilling to conform with public health requirements","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to non-compliance with public health measures","Mitigation":"Public health education, enforcement of regulations, and social influence campaigns","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring compliance, mobile apps for health information dissemination","People":"General public, community leaders, and policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies and government authorities"},{"Description":"Pivot to virtual delivery of education, experiences, and commerce","Impact":"Reduction of in-person interactions and potential isolation of individuals","Mitigation":"Promoting social connectedness, mental health support, and hybrid models for education and work","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, mental health apps, and telemedicine services","People":"Students, teachers, employees, and consumers","Owner":"Educational institutions, employers, and mental health organizations"}]}
